To: Aswathy Vijayan <Aswathy.Vijayan@chalhoub.com <mailto:Aswathy.Vijayan@chalhoub.com> >; Sudakshina Das <Sudakshina.Das@chalhoub.com <mailto:Sudakshina.Das@chalhoub.com> >; Shayma Dsouza <Shayma.Dsouza@chalhoub.com <mailto:Shayma.Dsouza@chalhoub.com> >; Nathalie Madamba <Nathalie.Madamba@chalhoub.com <mailto:Nathalie.Madamba@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Arlin Aranha <Arlin.Aranha@chalhoub.com <mailto:Arlin.Aranha@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Import and Export Declarations - All countries
Importance: High

 

Dear Team,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

Could you please provide a detailed report from the system of all imports and exports we’ve handled for the following countries:

 

*	UAE
*	KSA
*	Kuwait
*	Qatar
*	Bahrain

 

The report should cover the period from October 1, 2023, to August 31, 2024.

 

It would be greatly appreciated if we could receive this information by the end of the week, as we are currently in the process of renewing our policies.

 

Thank you for your assistance.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

Subject: Import and Export Declarations - All countries
Importance: High

 

Dear Team,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

Could you please provide a detailed report from the system of all imports and exports we’ve handled for the following countries:

 

*	UAE
*	KSA
*	Kuwait
*	Qatar
*	Bahrain

 

The report should cover the period from October 1, 2023, to August 31, 2024.

 

It would be greatly appreciated if we could receive this information by the end of the week, as we are currently in the process of renewing our policies.

 

Thank you for your assistance.

 

Best regards,
